title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 211.31 - Persons disqualified from officiating
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 211.31 - Persons disqualified from officiating

State Regulations

No boxer, manager, second, matchmaker, promoter, nor any
employee or agent of any promoter, matchmaker, boxer, second or manager, shall
officiate as a referee, judge, knockdown counter or timekeeper at any boxing
contest or exhibition. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
211.31

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
